channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Inside Trump’s private schedule as media fixates on his health
item.description: Fox News obtained President Donald Trump's December schedule revealing back-to-back meetings and calls extending into evening hours throughout the mon...

item.title: The CEO of one of Asia’s largest co-working space providers says his business has more in common with hotels
item.description: “It's a hospitality business," JustCo CEO Kong Wan Sin tells Fortune.

item.title: Trump names Warsh, Hassett as top Fed contenders, WSJ says
item.description: “I think the two Kevins are great,” he said. “I think there are a couple of other people that are great.”

item.title: Republican House leader signals plan to begin contempt proceedings against Bill and Hillary Clinton

item.title: House GOP produces wide-ranging health care bill they plan to vote on next week
item.description: House Republicans finalized a bill on Friday that Speaker Mike Johnson said will provide "clear, responsible alternatives" to Obamacare.

item.title: The Fed just ‘Trump-proofed’ itself with a unanimous move to preempt a potential leadership shake-up
item.description: “If I’m reading this properly, they just Trump-proofed the Fed.”

item.title: From Security Dependent to Civilizational Partner
item.description: Despite the hysteria, the Trump administration’s National Security Strategy seeks a better, healthier relationship with Europe.

item.title: House GOP unveils healthcare plan ahead of vote next week as cost hike looms for millions
item.description: House Republicans released text of a healthcare plan that they hope to vote for next week.

item.title: Pritzker Signs Law Welcoming State-Sanctioned Suicide To Illinois
item.description: State-sanctioned euthanasia not only pressures patients to choose suicide, but also inevitably ends in health care systems forcing suicide on patients...

item.title: Erika Kirk’s Anger Is Justified

item.title: Fox News Politics Newsletter: Omar accused of opening door to massive Minneapolis fraud
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Are Consigning the GOP to an Epochal Electoral Disaster
item.description: The downward trend in the president’s numbers is consistent and alarming.

item.title: Court pauses Judge Boasberg's criminal contempt pursuit of Trump officials

item.title: Preservationist group sues Trump over White House ballroom
item.description: President Trump is being sued by the nonprofit National Trust for Historic Preservation to stop the construction of the new White House ballroom.

item.title: ‘The question is really just how long it will take’: Over 2,000 gather at Humanoids Summit to meet the robots who may take their jobs someday
item.description: Researchers at McKinsey have counted about 50 companies that have raised at least $100 million to develop humanoids.

item.title: If Time Magazine Weren’t So Corrupt, It Would Have Made Charlie Kirk Person Of The Year
item.description: TIME could have used the credibility that choosing him would have helped restore.

item.title: Sen. Ron Johnson Asks DOJ To Investigate Judge Accused Of Misconduct In Trump Lawyers’ Trial
item.description: A judge with a 'grudge' against one of the defendants allegedly ghostwrote Wisconsin Judge John Hyland's August order denying a dismissal motion.

item.title: The Mind-Boggling Saga of Kilmar Abrego Garcia
item.description: This seems to have been epic government incompetence.

item.title: Gabbard blasts Democrat Bennie Thompson for calling National Guard shooting an ‘unfortunate accident’
item.description: Tulsi Gabbard slams Rep. Bennie Thompson for calling National Guard shooting an 'unfortunate accident.'

item.title: The Elitism of Merrily We Roll Along
item.description: A Sondheim preservation venture against the odds.

item.title: Trump says ‘starting’ land strikes over drugs in latest warning
item.description: “We knocked out 96% of the drugs coming in by water, and now we’re starting by land, and by land is a lot easier, and that’s going to start happening....

item.title: ADF: Employees Can’t Be Forced To Lie About Pronouns At Work
item.description: Employees don't have to insist on calling people by pronouns they don’t like. But they don’t have to say something they know is not true.

item.title: Seized oil tanker was hiding its location to evade sanctions, law enforcement
